author: craigmcc
msg: Update the struts-documentation application to a vastly improved look
and feel, based on generating the pages using a Xalan-powered XSLT
transformation.  Most of the original content still needs to be converted,
but this commit provides the framework.
The Struts documentation will also be uploaded and used as the contents
of the Struts project web site at <http://jakarta.apache.org/struts>.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the alphabetical order of attributes for "enumerate" and "iterate".
The examples for these tags should now work correctly.

author: craigmcc
msg: Allow the "name" attribute to be optional on <struts:enumerate> and

msg: Updated TODO list (as promised for *way* too long).  See mailing list
